title: Movie Myths About The South & Right Wing Myths About Guns 11.6.17
itunes:title: Movie Myths About The South & Right Wing Myths About Guns 11.6.17
description:
In episode 22, Jack & Miles are joined by comedian Caleb Synan to talk myths about the South, mass shootings, & then some fun stuff including Diddy's name change, Larry David, & then producer Anna Hossnieh joins in to discuss Saudi Arabia.
